11.name: Deathblade
11.description: Contributing to a kill grants +30 Attack Damage for the remainder of combat. This effect can stack any number of times.

12.name: Giant Slayer
12.description: Attacks deal an additional 12% enemy current Health as Physical Damage.

13.name: Hextech Gunblade
13.description: Heal for 25% of all damage dealt.

14.name: Spear of the Shojin
14.description: After casting, wearer gains 18% of its max Mana per attack.

16.name: Bloodthirster
16.description: Basic Attacks heal the wearer for 35% of the damage dealt.

17.name: Zeke's Herald
17.description: When combat begins, the wearer and all allies within 1 hex in the same row gain +30% Attack Speed for the rest of combat.

23.name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
23.description: Basic Attacks grant +5% bonus Attack Speed for the rest of combat. No stacking limit.

24.name: Statikk Shiv
24.description: Every third Basic Attack from the wearer deals 80 magic damage to 3/4/5 enemies.

25.name: Titan's Resolve
25.description: When the wearer takes damage or inflicts a critical hit, they gain a 2% stacking damage bonus. Stacks up to 50 times, at which point the wearer gains 25 Armor and Magic Resistance, and increases in size.

26.name: Runaan's Hurricane
26.description: Basic Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 70% of the wearer's Attack Damage and applying on-hit effects.

27.name: Zz'Rot Portal
27.description: When the wearer dies, a Construct with 1000/2000/3000 ★ Health aries to continue the fight.

29.name: Last Whisper
29.description: Critical hits reduce the target’s Armor by 90% for 3 seconds. This effect does not stack.

33.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
33.description: Wearer's Spell Power stat is amplified by 50%.

34.name: Luden's Echo
34.description: When the wearer casts their spell, the first target dealt magic damage and up to 3 nearby enemies are dealt an additional 150 / 175 / 225 magic damage.

35.name: Locket of the Iron Solari
35.description: Shields allies within two hexes in the same row for 250 / 275 / 350 damage for 8 seconds (scales with wearer’s Star Level).

36.name: Ionic Spark
36.description: Enemies within 2 hexes have their Magic Resist reduced by 50% (does not stack). When they cast a spell, they are zapped taking magic damage equal to 225% of their max Mana.

37.name: Morellonomicon
37.description: When the wearer deals damage with their spell, they burn the target, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

39.name: Jeweled Gauntlet
39.description: The wearer's spells can critically strike.

44.name: Blue Sentiel
44.description: Set's holder mana to 20 after each cast.

45.name: Frozen Heart
45.description: Adjacent enemies lose 50% Attack Speed. (Stacking increases the radius of this effect, not the amount of the slow).

46.name: Chalice of Power
46.description: At start of combat, the holder and their left and right neighbors gain 30AP for 20 seconds.

47.name: Redemption
47.description: When the wearer dies, allies are healed for 800 Health.

48.name: Star Guardian's Charm
48.description: Wearer is also a Star Guardian.

49.name: Hand of Justice
49.description: Each planning phase, gain one: Deal +50% more damage / Basic Attack heal 50 health on Hit.

55.name: Bramble Vest
55.description: Negates bonus damage from incoming critical hits. On being hit by a Basic Attack, deal 100 / 140 / 200 magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 second maximum). Scales with wearer’s Star Level.

57.name: Red Buff
57.description: Wearer's Basic Attacks burn the target on-hit, dealing 25% of the target's Maximum Health as true damage over 10 seconds and reducing healing by 50% for the duration of the burn.

59.name: Shroud of Stillness
59.description: When combat begins, shoots a beam straight ahead that delays affected enemies' first spellcast, increasing their max Mana by 40% until they cast.

67.name: Zephyr
67.description: When combat begins, the wearer summons a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

68.name: Celestial Orb
68.description: The wearer gains the Celestial trait.

69.name: Quicksilver
69.description: The wearer is immute to croud control for the first 10 seconds of combat.

77.name: Warmog's Armor
77.description: The wearer regenerates 5% of their missing Health per second. (max of 150 HP/tick).

79.name: Trap Claw
79.description: Start combat with a spell shield. Stun the champion that breaks it for 4 sec.

89.name: Dark Star's Heart
89.description: Wearer is also a Dark Star.

99.name: Thief's Gloves
99.description: Each planning phase, fetch two temporary items, quality based upon your player level. [Consumes Three item Slots]
